trans-unit.source: The object where the event handler is attached.
trans-unit.target: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 表示將處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView" /> 路由事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is typically only done within elements that support a scrollable region, or otherwise deliberately set their rendering size smaller than the combined desired size of their child element content, and is only done by deliberately handling the event once it has routed upwards in the element tree and has reached the first parent that offers scrolling region support.
trans-unit.target: 處理這個事件通常僅完成項目中，支援可捲動區域，或否則刻意將呈現大小為小於組合所需的大小的子系項目內容，只由刻意處理當有向上路由傳送項目樹狀結構中，而且已達到支援捲動區域的第一個父代的事件。

trans-unit.source: An existing implementation that handles scrolling regions in a manner that is typically desirable for user controls is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 處理的方式，通常會需要使用者控制項的捲動區域的現有實作是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, you can register a class handler for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=nameWithType> and supplement the base class handling of the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>，您可以註冊的類別處理常式<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=nameWithType>並補充基底類別處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: You should also consider using or class-handling the class-defined <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged> event instead of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 您也應該考慮使用或類別定義的類別處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged>事件，而不是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you create an entirely custom class that does not derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, you can still add class handling by calling <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in your class instantiation.
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您建立完整的自訂類別，不是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>，您還是可以加入類別處理藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>您類別具現化。

trans-unit.source: For details on class handling, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需類別處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[標示路由傳送事件中當做 Handled，和類別處理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。

trans-unit.source: Content elements can cause the event to be raised by their content hosts (through calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A> and raising <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=nameWithType> from the content host).
trans-unit.target: 內容項目可能會導致引發的事件，由其內容主機 (透過呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A>和引發<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=nameWithType>內容主機)。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can request logical tree elements to be brought into view with the helper method <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，您可以要求帶入檢視具有協助程式方法的邏輯樹狀結構項目<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> implements a related but different method <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A>.
